casebody.data:
The NC STATE BAR
v.
SUTTON 426A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 David C. Sutton, Greenville, Erika Sutton, for Sutton, David C. David R. Johnson, Deputy Counsel, Carmen Bannon, Deputy Counsel, for N.C. State Bar.

Mary D. Winstead, Deputy Counsel.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of January 2017 by Defendant to Amend Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
